Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Numerose partecipazioni come relatore a prestigiosi convegni scientifici internazionali, inclusi: American Finance Association Meetings (Washington DC, January 2003; San Diego, January 2004; Boston, January 2006; Atlanta, January 2010; Philadelphia, January 2014; Chicago, January 2017 (scheduled)); Western Finance Association Meetings (Vancouver, June 2004; Victoria, June 2010; Las Vegas, June 2012); National Bureau of Economic Association (NBER) Meetings (Boston, varie edizioni), e molti altri. Maggiori dettagli sui convegni e sui papers presentati a tali convegni nel CV allegato.

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Insegnamento del corso "Evaluating Capital Investment Projects" (MBA level) e del corso "Empirical Corporate Finance" (al PhD level) alla Samuel C. Johnson Graduate School of Management of the Cornell University

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Research Associate, European Corporate Governance Institute (ECGI)
Research Affiliate, Centre for Economic Policy Research (CEPR)

Rising Star of Corporate Governance, Millstein Center for Corporate Governance and Performance, Yale School of Management http://som.yale.edu/news/new s/millstein-center-names-rising-stars-co rporate-governance-2010
